name: Stick With ME
description:
A deadly thorny vine appeared and left poison everywhere, help the nurse collect the scattered Noops by sticking them to you and carrying them around, just be careful with the poison.

Try to achieve a high score by creating longer stacks and delivering as many Noops simultaneously as you can.

The only thing not created by me is the victory fanfare and the music. The latter of wich was creted by an anonymous on https://onlinesequencer.net/ 

This is my first game so I would very much appreciate some helpful criticism on what to improve.
